summary: Verified Italian number formatting (€ X.XXX,XX format) across Dashboard, IVA, Corrispettivi, and Prima Nota pages. All pages correctly display amounts with dot as thousands separator and comma for decimals. Global year filter in sidebar works correctly.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Italian number formatting verified working correctly using formatEuro function from lib/utils.js. Function uses toLocaleString('it-IT') with minimumFractionDigits: 2 and maximumFractionDigits: 2. Examples verified: € 10.098,90 (with dot as thousands separator), € 918,08, € 43,86, € 0,00. Global year filter in sidebar correctly filters data across all pages.

features_tested.global_year_filter: PASS - Sidebar year selector correctly filters data (tested 2025 and 2026)
